content: double_crochet double_crochet in each stitch working in the back loop only at the end of the row slip_stitch into the top of the chain 2 to close the round row 9 chain 2 double_crochet fpdc repeat between brackets until the end of row slip_stitch into the chain 2 to close the round row 10 chain 2 fpdc double_crochet repeat between brackets until the end of row slip_stitch into the chain 2 to close the round repeat row 9 and 10 until the sides are about an inch less than the desired height border row 1 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st until the end of row slip_stitch into the chain 2 to close the round row 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in the third loop of each st until the end of row slip_stitch into the chain 2 to close the round row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in the third loop of each st until the end of row slip_stitch into the chain 2 to close the round finish off and weave in ends
